name: DareDevil FP Game
description:
I am releasing an exclusive limited-time game!

All details are secret except the name and controls

Controls

  1. WASD for movement
  2.  The Left and right mouse buttons are for attacks
  3.  E for inventory
  4. Mouse to look around
  5. Figure everything else out through the game!

This game features the Marvel superhero: Daredevil

This is my first full-screen video game!

It is a FP game

The game will be downloadable for 1 week. Get it before it's gone!
